en: Enables control of goods transfer and service vehicle coverage.
If this is selected, service will be restricted to the districts listed below (and any permitted buildings or outside connections).
Add this district to the list of permitted districts
Remove this district from the list of permitted districts
Use the cursor to select a building to add to the list of permitted building
Remove this building from the list of permitted buildings
If this is selected, service will be restricted to the buildings listed below (and any permitted districts or outside connections).
Enable to ensure that the building can always service the same district and/or area that it's in, even if the district or area later changes.
Permit this building to import from outside connections. This is not affected by district or building restrictions.
Permit this building to export to outside connections. This is not affected by district or building restrictions.
Prisoner transfer by van to prison
Prisoner transfer by helicopter to prison
Prisoner transfer to a central police station
Selecting this will reserve a portion of this building's delivery vehicles to only service unique factories
Selecting this will reserve a portion of this building's delivery vehicles to only service outside connections (importing and exporting)
Selecting this will reserve a portion of this building's delivery vehicles to only service delivery within this city (and not be available for importing or exporting)
Set the number of reserved vehicles
Block offers with recent pathfind failures
Prevents offers from being matched if there's been a vehicle pathfinding failure between the two buildings in the past five minutes
This means that the mod is not able to operate
Transfer Controller was unable to complete its required Harmony patches.
Possible causes of this problem include:
The required Harmony 2 mod dependency was not installed
An old and/or broken mod is preventing Harmony 2 from operating properly
Transfer Controller detected a conflict with at least one other mod.
These mods must be removed before Transfer Controller can operate.
